testcase.name: Create new user payment details of REST APIs
testcase.system-out: * call read('classpath:reusable.feature') ................................. passed * def CreateUserReq = read('classpath:com/sample/rest/apis/CreateNewUserPayment.json') . passed Given url 'https://sample-4e6d.restdb.io/rest/payments' ................... passed And header x-apikey = '9677194df0cd556c1bb2f9aeee86c7e218482' ............. passed And request CreateUserReq ................................................. passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 201 ........................................................... passed * print 'response : '+response ............................................ passed * def id = response._id ................................................... passed * print 'Response Id : '+id ............................................... passed
